tns:patch.author: eperez
tns:patch.description: Update 'Show icons for Project Sites for locations up to' GS description

script.lang: update amp_global_settings set description= 'If 0 then Project Sites will always show sector icons, otherwise it will set an upper limit (for the number of locations) to show icons (if lower) or points (if higher). Icons can be disabled to show only colored points in the GIS tab of Feature Manager.' where settingsname = 'Show icons for Project Sites for locations up to';
